website_summaries.verdict: Quite inexpensive and a real bargain if you you get a good lamp – but that's not a guarantee.
pros: An active motion lamp that is priced right and works well after a break-in period
cons: Quality control is hit and miss
Some buyers reported that units arrived with cloudy liquid in lamp and some units take a long time to warm up

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! My son really wanted one, but he was too nervous to keep it plugged in after we told him it got hot. His older brother had to tell him it wasn't real lava, and then he was fine with it. 😀 Takes a bit to warm up, but really relaxing to watch once it gets going. Liquid is really more orange than yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendelynn B.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Time’s The Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical bc of the mixed reviews. It seemed as if you got a hit or miss product, and it happened to me. I bought it as a comfort for work, so imagine my anxiety when i received my item and it was leaking! I called Amazon the same day. My order was replaced and received the next day. No leaks! I thoroughly enjoy my lava lamp at work and so do my coworkers!
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It arrived safely right on schedule. It has worked perfectly from the first day. I am quite pleased with the purchase, especially at the on sale price. I use it for meditation and to help light my work desk. My grandchildren (too young to know these products started in the 70s) watch it with fascination !! I highly recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. S. V

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This shipped quickly and arrived in good condition. I set it up, plugged it in, turned in on, and in two hours it was doing its thing. It's been running for a week now without issue. Definitely happy with this lamp. The liquid is a little cloudy, not unlike many other lava lamps I've seen. It works. My kid loves it. Great lamp in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: George L Roach

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teenage son for a gift. Was as expected-he loves it. Think I could have gotten a lava lamp for cheaper if I looked around a little more
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: It’s Dope af
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you order. No problems. Brings a relaxing feel to a room and creates a cool cibe. Big fan. Can get hot so I recommend only using it for 5-6 hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: OleMissClark

customer_reviews.title: Creative Motion Black Base Liquid Peace Motion
customer_reviews.text: Kept the lamp lugged in over 24 hrs.-still didn't heat up enough for the wax to move up and down in the lamp; had to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: but it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The yellow water is a little murky, but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lusher

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Bought another lava lamp from another seller and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Bought another lava lamp from another seller and that was a big mistake! This one I bought for my other son works and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JayFree

customer_reviews.title: worked
customer_reviews.text: I have hear bad things about lava lamps but I have 2 of these and they work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy from this seller. Product did not work and having trouble getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: vivian popek

customer_reviews.title: It came with missing pieces which we decided to live ...
customer_reviews.text: It came with missing pieces which we decided to live with...then exactly one month to the day of purchase when we can no longer return it, it stopped working. A real bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Young

customer_reviews.title: Again the lava tirned to a cloud that rose to ...
customer_reviews.text: Again the lava tirned to a cloud that rose to the top and never came down. Thats two that have done it now. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: just someone

customer_reviews.title: very cheap item !!
customer_reviews.text: Very desapointed with this lamp. Liquid is leaking from inside its base and lava is just sitting down after more that one hour being plug. I could never recommend this product :/
customer_reviews.author: maria Irene cardiel

customer_reviews.title: ... at night and find this one to be as good as any I have had
customer_reviews.text: I have used these lamps at night and find this one to be as good as any I have had
customer_reviews.author: David Becker

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The color is not at all what is pictured. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Liquid is not filled to the top and the light bulb was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Pwilly13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... My son wanted it for Christmas and so far has enjoyed it very much. My only concern is how hot it gets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my room glow at night also no shipping problems
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: the light shines better than i expected. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. It comes with the bulb the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. It comes with the bulb the color is amazing the only this product can improve on is how long it takes to heat up. That's about it. But this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: A happy error
customer_reviews.text: This item was truly a happy error. My husband ordered the lamp with the yellow water and red oil and when I saw the picture of it, I hated it. I thought it was so ugly and was all ready to return it. Then the package arrived. The lamp inside was the incorrect lamp. This one has aqua water with yellow oil and is BEAUTIFUL!! It works fantastically and it casts off the most beautiful light. Thank you Creative Motion Ind. for reading my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Smitten with kittens

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I really thought it looked neat according to the picture but in person the yellow looks more orange-ish and the red doesn't really stand out that much. The water is also cloudy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat, Chris and Family

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this lava lamp dances beautifully, and the colors are great the liquid actually turns more orange after use but it is still very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected and poor packaging. Can't even use it.
customer_reviews.text: Received ours today with lava lamp liquid pooled inside of the packaging... the color of the liquid in the lamp does not match the description. We got the yellow and red lamp and the liquid is a dark urine color.
customer_reviews.author: A&M_Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When we got the dress, it had color dye stains. Only saving grace is you can't tell when you put it on as it's on the inner layer. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp *except* for stringy debris in liquid
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, the lamp gives off a warm glow, and the liquid is more orange than shown so it doesn't look like pee. The wax has really good motion with the wax once it heats up. (Every lava lamp I've seen takes a while to heat up, so not sure why so many of the negative reviews focus on that.) However, there's a bunch of stringy debris in the liquid, which is really noticeable when you look up close. Don't know how that got in there, really poor quality control. I tried removing the cap so I could strain it but couldn't without likely breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K

customer_reviews.title: I was going to leave a bad review but I upped it to 5 stars when ...
customer_reviews.text: Setup took less than 5 minutes. If Wax doesn't start moving in 2 hours, don't panic. Mine took about 4 to 5 hours before I got the first motion. I was going to leave a bad review but I upped it to 5 stars when everything started working as it should. Looks great on my nightstand by my bed. It gets extremely hot but that's normal. Beware if you have pets or children that can access it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors thrown off in a dark room
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors thrown off in a dark room, but the inside of the glass is stained and the yellow liquid looks contaminated with dirt or something. It's not noticeable until you are close to it. In my opinion these are hazardous because they get too hot. I used very thin mechanics wire to keep it from falling over if brushed by cat.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: After a month, working great!
customer_reviews.text: Yes the water is a little cloudy, but it doesn't detract from its use when it's on and going... Oh, on the first use, make sure the metal ring is flush with the bottom of the bottle or it'll never start working and seem broken... May have to shake it around a bit after it's been on for a little while to get it to go to the bottom. After that, no problems in future use. A months of use and lightbulb is still working...
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew had his lamp stolen in a robbery so I wanted to replace it quickly. I am so happy with this product because it's bright and beautiful but also sturdy. The fast shipping and great product saved the day for a sad little boy.
customer_reviews.author: E. P.

customer_reviews.title: My boys love having this in their room
customer_reviews.text: My boys love having this in their room! The water was foggy when I received it (just as other reviewers mentioned). However, after being on for a couple hours it has become a clear yellow, and has remained that way.
customer_reviews.author: FakePlasticTreesTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The motion light is something that you can't take your eyes off It very soothing and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie ROSS

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: It was nice at first but after a few days the water color turned cloudy and yellow/white. It stayed on my desk and was never moved so I’m not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these lamps and they are fantastic and look great
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these lamps and they are fantastic and look great. I am a lava lamp nut and these are great. Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: MrFourTwenty

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lava lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's bedroom and he thinks it's the coolest! It does get hot, but not too bad, and the colors are wicked vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch lava lamp
customer_reviews.text: It's a good lava lamp, but the light it came with only lasted for a week till it blowed, but overall it's still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors; makes that corner of the room look so warm in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Shona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works just as I had hoped. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stenz

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's room. He uses it every night!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our grandson's birthday. Who would have thought that a 9 year old in 2016 would want a Lava Lamp, least of all know what a Lava Lamp is? Worked perfect out of the box. Do pay attention to the directions as to how to allow it to set before plugging in. It does get a little beyond warm, but not to the going to cause burn scars temperatures. The temperature is more one of those that if you touch it once, you won't do it a second time. As for the price. The lamp was a bonus, the price was worth the smile on his face when he opened the gift.
customer_reviews.author: JVJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a LONG time to heat and makes weird shapes not shown photos.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just use it a few time to warm it up and it starts flowing.
customer_reviews.author: John Barnstable

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new lava lamp the only thing is now I want more of them! So moody! :) Peace!
customer_reviews.author: Jjobizzica

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is turning into Ebay.  Selling junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Looks like pond water with a red tumor quivering in it. This is a chinese p.o.s. So upset I feel for the deceptive picture. It looks nothing, I mean nothing like the pic. But don't take my word for it. Go ahead and buy it. You'll be so happy you did....pfft
customer_reviews.author: chasecom01

customer_reviews.title: Came as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My only complaint is it is hard on the eyes with the bright yellow. You cant really look at it with out seeing spots later.
customer_reviews.author: disneyjunkies

product_meta.title: Creative Motion Black Base Liquid Peace Motion Lamp, 16-Inch, Red Wax/Yellow
product_meta.description: 16" Black Base Red Wax/Yellow Liquid Peace Motion Lamp. This unit has the on/off switch on the cord with a direct plug to plug into you wall socket.
feature_bullets: 16" Black Base Red Wax/Yellow Liquid Peace Motion Lamp
Motion lamp with cool relaxing motion
Great for gift or home decor
